Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • HRPSapplication.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class managing reservations

    • Constructor Summary

      Reservation​(HotelRooms rooms, GuestMasterList gml, boolean isWalkIn, Reservation[] reservations, int noOfReservations)
      Construct a valid reservation P.S.isWalkIn is to differentiate the check-ins by walk-in from the ones by reservation

        public Reservation​(HotelRooms rooms,
                   GuestMasterList gml,
                   boolean isWalkIn,
                   Reservation[] reservations,
                   int noOfReservations)
        Construct a valid reservation P.S.isWalkIn is to differentiate the check-ins by walk-in from the ones by reservation
        Parameters:
        rooms - Array of rooms
        gml - Guest master list
        isWalkIn - Indicate if the reservation is Walk-In or By Reservation
        reservations - Array of reservations
        noOfReservations - Number of reservations
